title: A Pop Star Finds His Birth Dad After 50 Years
summary: Peter Cunnah is a famous singer from the band D:Ream, known for the song 'Things Can Only Get Better.' He was adopted as a baby and grew up in Northern Ireland. His mom told him he was adopted when he was young, which was a big surprise. Peter always wondered about his birth parents. After 50 years, he found his birth father, Patrick Hanna, who lives in England. Peter traveled to meet him, and it was an emotional moment. He learned that his father is a musician, and he has half-siblings who are also musicians. This story shows how Peter never gave up on finding his family.

background_read: Adoption is when a child is raised by parents who are not their birth parents. It can happen for many reasons, and some adopted children grow up wanting to find their birth families. This story is about a pop star who searched for his birth father for many years and finally met him, showing the importance of family and never giving up on dreams.
